flawed_nl_solution:
The first value drop of the lawnmower was 25/100 * 100 = $<<25/100*100=25.0>>25.0.
So the lawnmower was worth 100 - 25.0 = $<<100-25.0=75.0>>75.0.
Over the next year, the value dropped another 20/100 * 75.0 = $<<20/100*75.0=51.0>>51.0.
So after all this time, Ben's lawnmower is worth 75.0 - 51.0 = $<<75.0-51.0=24.0>>24.0.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15.0, not 51.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
